sn56.39:4.1: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti … pe …
sn56.39:4.2: ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti, te aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukhaṃ ullokenti:
sn56.39:4.3: ‘ayaṃ nūna bhavaṃ jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passatī’ti.
sn56.39:5.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, tūlapicu vā kappāsapicu vā lahuko vātūpādāno same bhūmibhāge nikkhitto.
sn56.39:5.2: Tamenaṃ puratthimo vāto pacchimena saṃhareyya, pacchimo vāto puratthimena saṃhareyya, uttaro vāto dakkhiṇena saṃhareyya, dakkhiṇo vāto uttarena saṃhareyya.
sn56.39:5.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti … pe …
sn56.39:5.6: ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti, te aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukhaṃ ullokenti:
sn56.39:5.7: ‘ayaṃ nūna bhavaṃ jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passatī’ti.
sn56.39:6.1: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti … pe …
sn56.39:6.2: ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti, te na aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukhaṃ ullokenti:
sn56.39:6.3: ‘ayaṃ nūna bhavaṃ jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passatī’ti.
sn56.39:7.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayokhīlo vā indakhīlo vā gambhīranemo sunikhāto acalo asampakampī.
sn56.39:7.2: Puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi, neva saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacāleyya;
sn56.39:7.5: dakkhiṇāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi, neva saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacāleyya.
sn56.39:7.8: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye ca kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti … pe …
sn56.39:7.9: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti, te na aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukhaṃ ullokenti:
sn56.39:7.10: ‘ayaṃ nūna bhavaṃ jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passatī’ti.
sn56.39:8.1: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yogo karaṇīyo … pe …
